Title: Prohibits state officers and employees from using state aircraft for political purposes
Summary: Prohibits a statewide elected official, state officer or employee, member of the legislature or legislative employee to use state aircraft for political purposes; provides a violation of such restriction constitutes a class A misdemeanor.
LawCode: Amd ยง73, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to political use of state aircraft by certain state officers and employees
